bug.author: yxftju
bug.summary: both admin account and account create from webpage can modify tasks
bug.description: I found that both admin account and account create from webpage can modify tasks, assign handlers. It seems it is an bug .How can I manage the account using admin ?

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/yxftju>@yxftju</denchmark-link>
Hi, thanks for the report. It looks a duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/cvat/issues/1030>#1030</denchmark-link> . We are going to fix it in the nearest future.

At the moment as workaround is possible to set to True here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/cvat/blob/develop/cvat/settings/base.py#L424>https://github.com/opencv/cvat/blob/develop/cvat/settings/base.py#L424</denchmark-link> to remove public access to unassigned tasks. The new permission system will be introduced in future releases.
